item.title: Netflix’s ‘The Hunting Wives’ Is a Very Zany, Very Gay, Red-State Murder Mystery: TV Review
item.description: The irresistible cocktail of rich women and murder has undergone countless variations over the years: as a broadcast soap on “Desperate Housewives”; as an upscale celebrity vehicle on “Big Little Lies
